Description.Text: Park Casino & Hotel is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Nova Gorica. It boasts free Wi-Fi and parking, fine dining and a large casino. Nova Gorica is a peaceful town situated in western Slovenia at the Italian border. It is notable for its modern casinos and green outdoor spaces. Nearby places of interest include the Regional Museum, Kostanjevica Monastery, the Perla and Park casinos and the magnificent Sveta Gora, where travellers can enjoy exceptional views overlooking the region. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Nova Gorica destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building featuring a stylish canopied entrance. Facilities include a large casino with bingo, slot machines, table games and a blackjack room. Guests receive complimentary access to the swimming pool, sauna and gym at the Perla spa centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are simply decorated with warm tones, carpeted floors and wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. The Tiffany restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine in an elegant ambience, whilst Alba is a buffet restaurant offering a varied selection in a casual space. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and light snacks at Vezuve Grill Bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
